title: Banned with no explination
body: I just tried to log in after being off for about 2 days, my account says I'm banned until Nov21, 2017. there is no explanation. Just that my account is suspended. This is a hefty suspension aswell, and I haven't been banned for being toxic or inting or anything recently. aswell as no cheating or chargebacks. No email was sent to me about it. I am very confused. Just wondering if maybe they ban the account if someone tried to hack it like they guessed my password wrong too many times and they thought it was suspicious and banned the account or whats up? please explain why the account was banned. I'm off of work and would love to rank up.

replies.body: So I went ahead and took a look at your account and it seems as if the account has been proactively locked due to suspicious activity in the account. If you submit a ticket over to our [Account Recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) team we can work with you to get it back.
does this mean I wont get season rewards? even if I'm found not guilty? and what is the suspicious activity?

Suspicious activity (usually) implies that your account has been compromised by another person.
If that is the case, if you're found not guilty and get your account back, you should be clear to get season rewards.
